mysteryTasks: Do an impression of a famous person.
Speak in a robot voice for 1 minute.
Pretend you're a cat for the next turn.
Balance a spoon on your nose.
Tell a made-up story with a twist ending.
Make everyone laugh in 15 seconds.
Whistle a tune and let others guess it.
Act like you're in slow motion for a minute.
Do your best evil laugh.
Draw something in the air and let others guess.
Sing a nursery rhyme in an opera voice.
Hop on one foot across the room.
Talk in a funny accent for the next 2 rounds.
Do 10 jumping jacks.
Pretend to be a zombie for 30 seconds.
Give a dramatic reading of a shampoo bottle.
Do your best chicken dance.
Walk like a crab for 10 steps.
Recite the alphabet backwards.
Make up a secret handshake with someone.
Balance a book on your head and walk in a circle.
Speak only in questions for the next minute.
Do your best impression of a dog.
Make a funny face and hold it until someone laughs.
Crawl like a baby across the room.
Give a compliment to everyone in the room.
Do 5 push-ups.
Pretend you're a superhero striking a pose.
Sing 'Happy Birthday' in a funny voice.
Do an interpretive dance to silence.
Wear your socks on your hands for the next round.
Tell a joke and don't laugh.
Do 10 squats.
Act like a mime trapped in a box.
Make up a short rap about the game.
Balance a pillow on your head for 15 seconds.
Speak only in exclamations for the next turn.
Do your best impression of a bird.
Wear a hat backwards for the rest of the game.
Do 5 burpees (modified if needed).
Pretend to be a frustrated chef.
Sing the chorus of your favorite song loudly.
Do your best impression of a confused alien.
Wear sunglasses indoors for the next 2 rounds.
Do 10 calf raises.
Pretend to be a weather reporter predicting silly weather.
Balance a remote control on your forehead.
Speak only in whispers for the next minute.
Make up a new word and define it.
Do 5 sit-ups.
Pretend to be a sleepy sloth.
Sing a commercial jingle with emotion.
Do your best impression of a monkey.
Wear a piece of clothing inside out for the rest of the game.
Do 10 arm circles forward and backward.
Pretend to be a robot trying to sit down.
Make a funny sound every time you take a turn for 2 rounds.
Walk backwards across the room.
Give everyone a high-five.
Do 10 lunges (5 each leg).
Pretend to be a detective looking for clues.
Balance a pen on your finger for 10 seconds.
Speak only in animal sounds for the next 30 seconds.
Make up a short poem about an object in the room.
Do 5 planks (hold for 10 seconds each).
Pretend to be a clumsy waiter.
Sing the ABCs in a scary voice.
Do your best impression of a fish.
Wear a sock on your nose for the next round.
Do 10 torso twists.
Pretend to be a very dramatic actor.
Balance a water bottle on your head.
Speak only in rhymes for the next minute.
Make up a funny dance move and show it.
Do 5 high knees.
Pretend to be a surprised cat.
Sing a lullaby to an imaginary baby.
Do your best impression of a surprised dog.
Wear your shirt inside out for the rest of the game.
Do 10 shoulder presses (imaginary weights).
Pretend to be a talking inanimate object.
Balance a toilet paper roll on your head and do 3 squats.
Speak only in movie quotes for the next minute.
Make up a funny catchphrase and use it three times.
Do 5 crunches while making a funny noise.
Pretend to be a very tiny person trying to reach something.
Sing a song from your favorite musical.
Do your best impression of a dolphin.
Wear a pair of pants on your head for 15 seconds.
Do 10 calf raises while standing on one leg (5 each).
Pretend to be a frustrated inventor.
Balance a cushion on your head and walk backwards.
Speak only in sounds, no words, for the next 30 seconds.
Make up a funny story about how you got here.
Do 5 burpees while yelling a silly word.
Pretend to be a chef tasting something absolutely delicious.
Sing a popular song while trying to touch your nose with your tongue.
Do your best impression of a famous cartoon character.
